data.name: College Kings - Act II
data.detailed_description:
ACT II IS BECOMING FREE

To celebrate the new era of College Kings, we are making Act II & III, completely free with the launch of College Kings 2 - Act I on April 14th.

Additionally, we are adding more content to Act III which includes the conclusion of the Europe trip and multiple brand new, voice acted sex scenes!

Anyone that's bought Act II or III before then will get a free copy of the official CK walkthrough, filled with 220 pages of guidance on how to get every scene, achievement and relationship in the game.

Wishlist College Kings 2 - Act I now:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1924480/College_Kings_2__Act_I/


About the Game


After a wild night at homecoming things get hot and heavy fast. It's a night you will never forget, but will it be for the right reasons?
The semester has started but you still have lots to learn, and Mr. Lee will make sure of that however unorthodox his methods are.
As you grow closer to Penelope she confesses her secret to you before it's too late, but it doesn't end there.
Pledging to your fraternity was the biggest decision so far and tensions rise between the Apes and the Wolves. It's clear that those you thought had your back may not be so friendly after all when training for the summer showdown kicks off.

data.short_description: After a wild night at homecoming things get hot and heavy fast. And since pledging to your fraternity it's not just the girls you have to worry about. Those you thought had your back may not be so friendly after all when training for the summer showdown kicks off.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
College Kings contains sexual depictions, violence and drug references. Not intended for audiences under 18 years old. 
All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old.
